import { useLocation} from "react-router-dom"; // Import Fetch Component import useFetch from "../components/useFetch"; //FontAwesome import 'font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css'; const BlogDetails = () => { // Get Blog's id from state prop of location let location = useLocation(); // Fetch Blog Data let {data: blog, isPending, error} = useFetch("/foodie-master/data/blogs.json", location.state); return (
{isPending &&
